headline: Parker Elects Beth A. Wozniak to its Board of Directors
summary: CLEVELAND, Sept. 02, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Parker Hannifin Corporation (NYSE: PH), the global leader in motion and control technologies, today announced the election of Beth A. Wozniak to its Board of Directors, effective September 1, 2025. Ms. Wozniak is currently Chair and Chief Executive Officer of nVent Electric plc, a leading provider of electrical connection and protection solutions worldwide. She has more than 35 years of experience across the aerospace, automation, and industrial manu
